description: Yunoki Yoriko is a Commander in the United States Navy, in the information warfare division. She is a genius hacker, with skills approaching those of http://anidb.net/ch2311 [BPS] himself. She temporarily transferred to http://anidb.net/ch2374 [Misao]`s school to be able to meet BPS. While there, she quickly realised the feelings that BPS has for Misao, and might possibly have developed some feelings for him of her own.
name: Yunoki Yoriko
